comment: This semester I dealt with a period of time where I was completely overwhelmed with the class. Communication with her was somewhat inconsistent and when I asked for assistance. I wouldn't recommend this class for anyone who has serious trouble learning math concepts. Its much more self paced than anything and not designed for visual and auditory st
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: This professor was wonderful!!! She gives 2 attempts on quizzes, 3 exams, a pulse a final (I exempted), and a general assessment. Homework to! Do your work and you will get an A! Many students complained but they stopped coming to class... But, she said she's retiring so she may not be available. Essentially, I'm glad I had the opportunity to take

Professor Burney is so caring and makes sure all of her students succeed! Although being online, she made a way to connect with students and individually help everyone whether in class or during office hours.

Great professor. Clear guidelines on everything from homework, videos to exams. She gives you the chance to setup meetings with her to review over your exam as well to figure out what you got wrong. Very friendly and enjoyed the course

go to class! not required but helps. sometimes she would post her lectures from the past and they're amazing to watch. three exams and few quizzes. in class exams and quizzes online with lockdown browser. homework on connect math. if you don't like to work for your grade then don't take her cause you have to put in time and effort to get a A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Lecture heavy

comment: I hate math and statistics and I usually find it hard to understand but she makes it so much easier to understand. I would recommend her to anyone and everyone.

She makes biostat super easy. She loves what she teaches and that translates into her passionate style. She cares about her students and is willing to work with you to get an A. Definitely take her; she makes it an easy A. No textbook or homework access required.

Originally I was a bit skeptical of this class, but, fortunately, it was more of a reading course than a mathematics course. Online assessments and practices are plentiful, but you have a fair shake and can utilize a calculator. Professor Burney is kind and caring, offered many chances at extra credit, and gave clear instructions. Simple and fair.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Burney is a very sweet and caring lady, she understands that math isn't everyone's forte, and she makes her statistics class doable. Three tests and a final exam (can exempt if you have over a 93 or 94), online quizzes through d2l and online homework through the online textbook program. Would definitely recommend!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Caring

comment: She is easy but tries to put alot on the test. There are only 3 test and a cumulative final but you can have a cheat sheet. STUDYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY

Professor Burney is so passionate about Stat. She obvious cares about her students and her lectures are so good. I've never taken a stat class before, but she made the intimidating subject easy to understand! She posts all of her notes online. She is very fair and so are her tests. Attendance is NOT mandatory but she expects everyone to come.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Took it as an Hybrid. Pretty chill class with mandatory attendance. Three tests with 3 hwk assignment and NO final. She offers plenty of extra credit and is lenient with grading. Bruney is very passionate about statistics and her class is enjoyable.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Burney is passionate about Statistics, and her grandchild. It's been a while since I have taken a math course, so the material took a bit for me to understand. It's not a difficult course - Professor does a lot of back-tracking, slightly confusing. Study study study, and take heavy notes!

Super sweet old lady, she is very dedicated. Definitely an easy A class if you study her fill in the blank notes. She lets you create and use your own cheat cheat for every test! A little heavy on the homework but it helps a lot.

Mrs. Burney is an amazing professor!! She has fill in the blank notes that you print before class and the tests are basically based off those. Its one of the easiest math classes ive taken. She is so sweet, kind, and definitely wants you to succeed in her class. Its an easy A if you just pay attention in class and do the simple homework. take her!!

seriously please take her. its for your own good. nicest and sweetest person ive ever had teach me math. my entire life i always made C's in math and i came out with an A in her class. she gives out teaching notes that you fill in to make your life so much easier.

Outstanding professor. such a nice lady and is very easy to learn from and get along with. she makes teaching notes that you just fill in and she provides space for you to work out example problems that she does. i have never been good at math but currently have a 98 in her class. I highly recommend. the homework isn't awful but has readings w/ it
Great teacher, the material is easily digestible and she was an easy teacher for a 9 am

BEST professor I have ever taken. I am a junior and have taken many classes and she has been the best professor by far. If you do not get an A in the class then you obviously did not try at all. She only teaches the material necessary for the course and does not over work you. She goes at a slow pace so everyone understands all the material.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures--Would take again

comment: She is a good professor, but she can be frustrating to listen to sometimes. She makes a lot of careless mistakes on her notes, quizzes, and tests. Every class you can count on her making a mistake on her notes. She also interrupts the class at lease twice during every exam to point out a mistake she has made. She is okay, but she is unprofessional.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: She cares about students so much and makes sure you understand the material. HIGHLY RECOMMEND. Such an easy A if you do the "ConnectMath" homework. Makes little review videos and everything before tests. Super easy to understand. She's awesome!

She's nice and knows Statistics but sometimes doesn't know what she writes down on her teaching notes. 4 tests, final, homework due almost before every class-isn't hard you can keep doing it until you make a 100. Her grading is crazy, isn't very clear on how she wants you to do stuff on tests and then will count off.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Took this class to fill my math requirement and she was awesome! Would recommend, but be sure to go to class it really helps and do the homework for the easy As!

I read professor burney was great at teaching stats, and since math isn't my best subject I took her. Worst. Mistake. Ever. Professor Burney says she'll give partial credit if you give the wrong answer on a test but show your work: wrong. Her tests are super hard, even when you use the study guide, worksheets, and teaching notes. DON'T TAKE HER!

She is fabulous. She is super helpful, super clear in what she wants. Some videos are long but they are helpful when replaying and doing homework. Coding for SAS and R are difficult but she is there to help you. Would definitely take her again. I enjoyed her class very much.

Nice instructor but the assignments seemed really big. The videos were good but sometimes redundant (making it hard to sit through) There were many short videos. Learning new software can be frustrating and these applications are not self explanatory (some idea of how programming language works helps). Weekly quizzes are easy if you read.

As an online course don't take this professor!  There 's no textbook and the manual for this class online isn't conclusive; you will have to teach yourself.  I'd say this was more of a self paced course.  There are quizzes and you have two attempts to get an A that's a plus.  I got a B should have been an A.  For best results take in a classroom!!

Hands down one of the sweetest professors I've ever taken! She genuinely cares about her students. She is clear on what she wants. Even taking this as an online class, I was able to clearly understand her lectures and what was expected. No exams. Only really LONG projects & quizzes. She responds fast to emails and is always there to help,literally!
Excellent professor - made the class relevant to today and fun. I was scared to death to take this class due to everyone saying how hard it was- just do the work. It's a great class
Attendance is not mandatory, but you do get points for attendance that can RAISE your grade. My grade would have been a C, but attendance brought it up to B.

In regards to Statistics 3010, please do NOT take this as a HYBRID class. The  only way I can describe the content of this class is that you have to interpret computer coding. Don't get excited about not having to buy a book, that's because your 'book' is a MANUAL. Free, but HARD to understand. Burney is 'nice' but I still had to Withdraw :/

Lots of work but explained VERY well. I had issues and asked for help. She did everything she could to help. I had to do the work, but she was there to answer ANY question I had. She is not as helpful if you blow off her class. Beware she expects adults and you will work for the grade but it will be fairly given. This is not a fluff class

Well, I took the hybrid class which was a BIG MISTAKE. DO NOT do that for this class. She is an EXTREMELY nice teacher, and I could tell she would be helpful in an ordinary class. But she makes hybrid classes pretty difficult. Boring videos and stuff. You're basically teaching yourself. But if you're taking a traditional class, you'll succeed

This professor ROCKS!!! She is very helpful and is hilarious! She will walk you through everything, and her guides are very useful. I didn't like learning SAS though, that program is not used as much as "R" is. Attendance not mandatory and you can get an A without attending if you know the programs, but attending helped clarify many questions!

Dr. Burney is a wonderful professor. She is always willing to help and has a vast amount of knowledge within her field. She always posts very detailed notes online that makes it easy for her students to understand the different systems of computer analysis. Overall she is a wonderful teacher (unless you are anal about getting HW back super fast)
Very excited about teaching.  Very helpful.  Willing to give extra credit.  Slow on grading projects, but provides detailed feedback.  Great teacher to have.

Professor Burney really knows her stuff. However, her class is a lot of work. If you aren't interested in working outside of class, this is not for you. Mandatory attendence, projects, homework and worksheets.

If you hate Statistics Mrs. Burney is the teacher for you. She makes concepts easy to understand and genuinely cares about her students. Her lectures are clear and easy to understand. She gives extra credit and the tests are fair (although challenging). If I had to take Stats again I would settle for no one other than her.

Explains everything you need to know for Excel, Minitab, SAS and SPSS. SAS was complicated but you need to know if for future STATS classes. Assigns more work than she can grade! But very nice and always willing to help.

Love her. Kindest professor I've ever had. Too much stuff to keep up with, but she really puts a lot of effort into the class! She wants us to succeed so if she sees that we are struggling, she offers extra credit. The book SUCKS and even she acknowledges that. The problems she gives on tests are easier than the book/online homework. Thank god!

Prof. Burney is a wonderful teacher! She gives out great notes & extra credit, which made this class a lot easier. Also, study groups are offered in case you don't fully understand the material. She does require a good amount of work that is hard to keep track of, but otherwise, this class is great for students who aren't great at math. Good luck!

Mrs. Burney is so confusing. I'm not a fan of her teaching style. She just does examples the whole time and the problems we do are nothing like the ones on the test. If you have a mac, then you're pretty much not going to be able to the the projects that are assigned. We have tons of online quizzes that are hard to keep up with.

She is absolutely wonderful! I hate math and she made it very easy for me. She loves her job and all of her students, and she wants everybody to do well. She is very helpful and there are SI sessions if you need more help. There are also plenty of chances to drop low quiz grades. Take her if you know what is good for you! haha
Typical math professor in her teaching style. Goes over stuff repetitively, explains things well. Lots of opportunities to drop low quiz grades. Very sweet woman who wants you to do well.

Mrs. Burney is truely a sweeatheart, she's very easy to talk to, and I have yet to see her get mad. Class is not mandatory,but if you miss,you will get behind..Math is not me at all and she had study sessions to help out on tests....Take her if you really want to learn, work is plentiful,but its not so bad!!

If math is not your subject take her, i am really good at math and i was really bored in this class.  Class is mandatory if you want to exempt the final.  Study guide quizzes for every section.  Really easy A.  Nice lady, but really slow at grading! very easy class
She is probably one of the sweetest ladies ever! I recommend taking her because she is very helpful and very easy to understand. Go to the SI sessions, they help a lot! Take her!!!

So...I took her class last semester for math1101 and she was so helpful. BUT...now she is spacey and always blames her forgetfulness on not getting enough sleep. She always needs correcting with her work. Really nice though :)

I absolutely LOVED professor Burney! She is such an awesome teacher, almost all of her students tried to take her next level class. She is a wonderful teacher, she is great at explaining the material and she is extremely knowledgeable! TAKE THIS CLASS!!

She was the best math teacher I have ever had! She explains things so thoroughly and clearly and is always willing to help you with a problem. If you aren't the best math student or even if you are I HIGHLY RECOMMEND taking this professor. She was awesome.

Whoever said she is a bad teacher is plain stupid. She is the best teacher I have ever had. She makes the material soooo easy to understand, even if it seems really hard. She's such a sweet lady and has a heart of gold. You can tell her passion is teaching! AMAZING WOMAN!!

TAKE HER!!!! She is AMAZING. the best math teacher..makes everything very easy to understand. if math is not your best subject i highly recommend  her. she gives you extra credit opportunities and allows you to drop lowest test grade.easy A

This teacher, on her worst day, is better than any math teacher I have ever had.  She is totally there for the student.  You can tell she loves to teach.  The information posted online is helpful.  She always answers questions in class.  There is a lot of work required; but if you do your work, you will make a good grade.

The BEST teacher I've ever had. She's AMAZING. Do the H/W - lectures & study guides are on webCT and she gives study sessions.  She's always willing to help students and it's obvious she LOVES to teach.  I'd take her again in a heart beat.  She was hand downs the best teacher I've ever had.

She is extremely dedicated and approachable. She makes all of her lectures, powerpoints, and study guides available on Web-CT, so you really have no excuse if you don't make an A. Very nice and patient!
One of the nicest teachers ever, class isnt mandatory but if you get extra credit. make the class so easy. i left the class with a 100.5 average. TAKE HER! Shes a really sweet lady
she was really easy and nice. We had fun in her class as well as learning the lesson plan. she's cool and I definitely recommend taking a class from her!

I took her MATH1107 stats class. She is AMAZING!!! She's so focused, well organized, knows and lets know students what exactly she wants out of an assignment, test, project. She puts all her lectures on WebCT. But her classes are much more interesting and give you a clear idea about the powerpoints she has on. a lotta extra credit opportunities.
She is very helpful and gave us a lot of stuff to give us extra credit. I was struggling at first and she helped me get my grade up to a C! Make sure you do your MathXL homework and go to class.
